sect2.title: Installation of GSview
sect2.para: GSview uses netscape to browse through the online help. BLFS does not install Netscape, but has other browsers from which to choose. Simply edit srcunx/gvxreg.c using the following sed script with your browser's executable file name substituting for [browser]:
Install GSview by running the following commands:

userinput.command: sed 's|GSVIEW_ROOT=/usr/local|GSVIEW_ROOT=/usr|' \ srcunx/unx.mak > Makefile && patch -Np1 -i ../gsview-&gsview-version;-pstotext.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../gsview-&gsview-version;-lang.patch && make && make install
